roleset.name: scheduled (perhaps fully)

example.name: arg2
example.text: Wow ! Cool . Sorry you have to wait but I guess it 's good I 'm booked !

example.name: args3 and 1
example.text: I doubt it 's me ! :-RRB- It 's probably booked with returning patients . :-RRB-
example.note: Here, the patients are the schedule entries, from the point of view of the speaker/hearer
